transportAdvice: Hurghada's resort strip is long and not easily walkable end-to-end, so taxis and minibuses are the primary ways to get around; taxis are widely available but fares should be agreed in advance. Public minibuses connect major areas at low cost, though tourists typically rely on taxis or hotel transfers for convenience.
